aiCommit.configuration.general.title: General
aiCommit.configuration.git.title: Git
aiCommit.configuration.openai.title: OpenAI
aiCommit.configuration.gemini.title: Gemini
aiCommit.command.aiCommit.title: Nota AI Commit - Generate commit message
aiCommit.config.diffSource.description: Which git changes to use for generation: auto (prefer staged, fallback to unstaged), staged, unstaged, or staged+unstaged.
aiCommit.config.referenceGitLog.descript: Include recent git commit history (git log --oneline) as additional context for the model.
aiCommit.config.gitLogCount.description: How many recent commits to include from git log (max 50).
aiCommit.config.gitLogAuthorScope.descri: Which authors' commits to include in git log context.
aiCommit.config.openaiBaseUrl.descriptio: OpenAI Base URL (optional). Should end with /v1 (e.g. https://api.openai.com/v1). For Azure OpenAI, use your deployments URL.
aiCommit.config.openaiModel.description: OpenAI MODEL, you can select a model from the list by running the 'Show Available OpenAI Models' command
aiCommit.config.systemPrompt.description: Custom system prompt for generating commit messages
aiCommit.config.openaiTemperature.descri: OpenAI temperature setting (0-2). Higher values make output more random, lower values more deterministic.
aiCommit.config.aiProvider.description: AI Provider to use (OpenAI or Gemini)
aiCommit.config.geminiBaseUrl.descriptio: Gemini Base URL (optional). Leave empty to use the official endpoint. If using a proxy/vendor, fill only the service base URL (do NOT include a specific endpoint path).
